name: R.E.A.P. Prototype
description:
R.E.A.P. is my endschool project. Made in 3-4 months all by myself, R.E.A.P. is a brawler-twinstick shooter hybrid that was made as a throwback to old arcade games such as Golden Axe and Knights of the Round.

Features a two-player mode!

The game is in a early prototype stage, so I didn't add a health bar for players. It would just get in the way of development and testing.

Controls:

Player 1:

WASD / Arrow keys: Move

Mouse: Aim weapon

Z / Left Click: Attack

X / Mouse Wheel Click: Special (must attack enemies to charge it up first, as indicated by the growing blue bar. When it's purple, you can use the special)

C / Right Click: Change weapons

Player 2 (controller):

To enable player 2, press the space bar or the start button on the controller in the character menu.

Left joystick: Move

Right joystick: Aim

X / Square / RB / R1: Attack

Y / Triangle: Special

B / Circle: Change weapons

To choose a weapon in the equipment menu, you must first click on the slot on the left then on the desired weapon from the list on the right.
